caller_intent: Juan Jose wants to reinstate full coverage on his Tundra's insurance policy, referencing a 500 deductible similar to the Honda's policy.
resolution_steps: Agent asked for the policy number.
Agent retrieved the policy number (2020-314177) from the database.
Agent offered to transfer the call to a specialist to handle the coverage adjustment request.
summary: Aelia called on behalf of her husband Juan Jose to reinstate full coverage on his Tundra's policy with a 500 deductible. The agent retrieved the policy number and transferred the call to a specialist for further assistance.
